metadata.description: TiPAI-TSPO POC Dataset: 20 base prompts Ã— 4 variations (5 objects, 1 changed per variation)

variation_types.v2_object: ONE object swapped for different object
variation_types.v3_spatial: Wrong spatial relation or count for ONE object

metadata.design_note: Each prompt has 5 distinct objects. Variations change exactly 1 object for clear segment identification.
